data.title: Yummy stuff.....closed on Mondays
data.text:
We stayed about a half mile from Colozza's  bakery. WONDERFUL strudels, cakes, cookies.

Parma Ohio must have more fine Ma + Pa Bakeries, Pizza, and restaurants than any other Cleveland suburb.
It is hard to find a chain hamburger or pizza place here..that speaks volumes.  The locals EXPECT good eats.

data.title: Excellent Pastry
data.text: Highly recommended for excellent pastry and other goodies.  Their rum soaked yellow cake treat are super

data.title: Dad's Birthday Cake
data.text: We got a birthday cake for my dad here this year - a cassata cake which is his favorite and it was a hit! I've never seen him eat a slice of cake so fast! Thank you for the wonderful service.  I love giving the family owned businesses my sales as opposed to the bakeries like giant eagle.

data.title: Very good
data.text: Went on New Years Eve to try it for the first time . It was very good! I had a Cannoli and I absolutely loved it! Prices are good and good is delicious . They are known for there cassata cakes which I have not tried yet . Definitely recommend

data.title: Excellent Italian Bakery!
data.text: Whenever I am in this area, a stop at Colozza's Bakery is a "must."  While all of their offerings look fantastic and fresh, I usually buy an assortment of their cookies.  At $11/pound, they are not inexpensive but they are consistently delicious, attractive, fresh and of high quality.  Need to try some other items during my next visit!

data.title: Perfect Wedding Cake
data.text:
Colozza's made the cake for our wedding and even the DJ (who is at weddings all the time) took a picture of how beautiful it was! They have tons of demo cakes set up in the bakery instead of just pictures and you're able to pick and choose between bits of each to create your perfect custom cake. The staff are super easy to work with and will make you feel like a million bucks. In addition to all that IT WAS DELICIOUS.

NOTE: I ended up chipping a tooth on a non-edible rhinestone on the cake. However, this was not the fault of the bakery but the reception venue as Colozza's told them to remove the stones before serving which the venue did not.

data.title: Best pacski's anywhere!
data.text: This is your typical italian bakery.  They have great cakes and cookies.  But I think they're pacski's during lent are the very best anywhere.  They're always so fresh and they don't skip on the filling, just the right amount.  You won't be disappointed!

data.title: Try the White Cake!
data.text:
This is a wonderful bakery.  The food is not only beautiful to look at, but the taste is outstanding.  The owner and the staff are very nice people.  Made a large purchase for a large family group.  The white cake was very good.  We also had donuts and cookies.  They were all great.

Will revisit again if I'm in the area.

data.title: Baked Bliss
data.text: Great cakes, cassatas and other cream filled flavors as well.  Really good bread, cookies and pizzelles. Family run and a tasty treat when you want to keep your sweet tooth happy!
